name: DeadlockCrating_Integrations
title: Deadlock's Crating Machine Integrations for Bob's mods - Continuation
author: SuperSandro2000, Recon & Pawz
description: Adjusts the crating machine recipes to match Bob's Mods recipes, and adds higher tier crating machines. Requires Deadlock's Crating and Stacking for Bob's and Angel's mods.
